association.js - Fis3 Code

Global variables defined

  • isInput

Functions defined

  • add
  • has
  • insert
  • invalidator
  • remove

Source code

  1. 'use strict';

  3. ‌var isInput = require('./isInput');
  4. var bindings = {};

  6. ‌function has (source, target) {
  7.   var binding = bindings[source.id];
  8.   return binding && binding[target.id];
  9. }

  11. ‌function insert (source, target) {
  12.   var binding = bindings[source.id];
  13.   if (!binding) {
  14.     binding = bindings[source.id] = {};
  15.   }
  16.   var invalidate = invalidator(target);
  17.   binding[target.id] = invalidate;
  18.   source.on('data', invalidate);
  19.   source.on('destroyed', remove.bind(null, source, target));
  20. }

  22. ‌function remove (source, target) {
  23.   var binding = bindings[source.id];
  24.   if (!binding) {
  25.     return;
  26.   }
  27.   var invalidate = binding[target.id];
  28.   source.off('data', invalidate);
  29.   delete binding[target.id];
  30. }

  32. ‌function invalidator (target) {
  33.   return function invalidate () {
  34.     target.refresh();
  35.   };
  36. }

  38. ‌function add (source, target) {
  39.   if (isInput(target.associated) || has(source, target)) {
  40.     return;
  41.   }
  42.   insert(source, target);
  43. }

  45. module.exports = {
  46.   add: add,
  47.   remove: remove
  48. };
